user_query: I want to create advanced real-time chart images for 'BINANCE:BTCUSDT' with specified studies and formats.

TaskList.description: Generate an advanced real-time chart image for the symbol 'BINANCE:BTCUSDT' incorporating studies like RSI, MACD, and Bollinger Bands with a dark theme.
Save the advanced chart image in PNG format.
Generate a mini chart image for the symbol 'BINANCE:BTCUSDT' with a dark theme.
Save the mini chart image in JPEG format.
